name: AFI Compare to Aroma Black Currant Angel by Lush® F38196
description: Compare to Aroma Black Currant Angel by Lush® F38196 is an intriguing fragrance oil that combines the sweetness of black currant with notes of charred wood and gasoline, resulting in a uniquely bold aroma. This fragrance oil can be used in various applications, including body wash, candles, incense, laundry detergent, shampoo, and soap. It falls under the category of Lush fragrances and is identified by the F-CODE F38196. Additionally, it complies with Proposition 65 regulations.
